countryToIDDCode.description: Give the mapping from an ISO country code to an international direct dialing code

IDDCodeTocountry.description: Give the reverse mapping from an international direct dialing code to an ISO country code. Since multiple countries share dialing plans, this maps to the default country for each plan

sharedDialingPlans.description: For those dialing plans that support multiple countries, list the countries in that dialing plan

countryCodes.description: The array of ISO codes of the countries that are in that dialing plan

default.description: The ISO code for the default country for that dialing plan
